title: Map high-value rooms
description: Some of your most profitable rooms aren't available on key booking channels yet.

title: Review pricing strategy
description: Your rates haven't been updated in 30+ days. Consider adjusting for current demand.

title: Fix family occupancy settings
description: Your child occupancy settings don't match your room capacity, which might affect family bookings.

title: Showcase key facilities
description: Missing photos of your pool, restaurant, or room views? These help guests make decisions.

title: Add more photos
description: Properties with more photos get up to 30% more bookings. Add images of your facilities and rooms.

title: Add missing rate plans
description: Your high-performing rate plans could be generating more bookings on additional channels.

title: Re-enable room mapping
description: A high-value room was recently disconnected from one of your top channels.
